Sentencas: Ni-Ce0.8Gd0.2O1.9 composite is an efficient anode electrode in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Preparation and characterisation of NiO-Ce0.8Gd0.2O1.9 composite nanofibres via electrospinning

Sentencas: In this study, for the first time, the remarkably simple technique of electrospinning has been employed to prepare the corresponding nanofibres.
Titulo: Preparation and characterisation of NiO-Ce0.8Gd0.2O1.9 composite nanofibres via electrospinning

Sentencas: For this purpose, the cation complexation method was applied for preparing a sol containing Ni, Gd and Ce nitrates as the precursors and citric acid as the chelating agent.
Titulo: Preparation and characterisation of NiO-Ce0.8Gd0.2O1.9 composite nanofibres via electrospinning

Sentencas: Gel formation was accomplished by heating the sol at 80 degrees C and then a polyvinyl alcohol solution was added to maintain proper viscosity of the electrospinning solution.
Titulo: Preparation and characterisation of NiO-Ce0.8Gd0.2O1.9 composite nanofibres via electrospinning

Sentencas: The spun nanofibres were calcined at different temperatures to obtain the NiO-GDC nanofibrous material.
Titulo: Preparation and characterisation of NiO-Ce0.8Gd0.2O1.9 composite nanofibres via electrospinning

Sentencas: Calcined nanofibres were characterised by X-ray diffraction, Fourier transform infrared spectroscopy, scanning electron microscopy, a energy dispersive spectrometer, transmission electron microscopy and Brunauer-Emmett-Teller techniques.
Titulo: Preparation and characterisation of NiO-Ce0.8Gd0.2O1.9 composite nanofibres via electrospinning

Sentencas: It was found that the size of crystalline nanofibres were in the range of 90 nm.
Titulo: Preparation and characterisation of NiO-Ce0.8Gd0.2O1.9 composite nanofibres via electrospinning

Sentencas: Specific surface area is found to be 145 m(2)/g for the calcined nanofibre at 900 degrees C.
Titulo: Preparation and characterisation of NiO-Ce0.8Gd0.2O1.9 composite nanofibres via electrospinning
